txt.en: Chapter 4.4: Raiders In Tûm Rost
'The Lady Nauriel prepares a response to deal with the Corsair raiders. Hurry now to her side, for there is little time to waste if we are to save the folk of Tûm Rost!'
Talk to Nauriel in Ost Arndír
'The Lady Nauriel prepares a response to deal with the Corsair raiders. Hurry now to her side, for there is little time to waste if we are to save the folk of Tûm Rost!'
Talk to King Elessar in the main hall of the keep of Ost Arndír
Talk to King Elessar in the keep of Ost Arndír and join the defence of Tûm Rost
'A number of Corsair ships have sailed in secret up the Hathollant river, and now they pillage the farms and villages of Tûm Rost. I will dispatch our soldiers at once. Are you with us, Elessar?'
Talk to Nauriel in the main hall of the keep of Ost Arndír
'TBD - Blah!'
TBD - Talk to Orgolas in Ost Arndír
'We will fight alongside you to defend the Green Hills, Nauriel. Count my warriors among your number!\n\n'Are you prepared for this, [placeholder]? Tell me when you are ready to depart for Tûm Rost.'
TBD - Talk to Nauriel in Ost Arndír
'I will dispatch our soldiers at once. Are you with us, Elessar?'
'Then let us depart for Tûm Rost with all haste!'
Talk to King Elessar in Ost Arndír

'This outrage cannot stand! I will wage such war upon the Corsairs that they will not sail within sight of Gondor for a thousand years! I will call to arms every knight that has ever raised sword within Pinnath Gelin to follow me and rescue my son!'
Tûm Rost has been attacked by Corsair raiders, and now the folk of Pinnath Gelin must spring to its defence.
'TBD - Blah!'
Nauriel is inside the main hall of the keep in Ost Arndír.

TBD - Nauriel is at TBD in Ost Arndír.
King Elessar hopes to bring his own fighters to join the defence of Tûm Rost against the Corsair raiders.
King Elessar is inside the main hall of the keep of Ost Arndír.

'I think there is reason to believe the Corsairs will not harm Thorongil, Nauriel. They will see value in keeping him alive to use in a potential bargain with Gondor. If we act rashly we might endanger the boy's life; we must not risk that.

'I want to send someone to follow the ships. We must track them from shore, and see where they sail. It is not certain they will return directly to Umbar, and if they put in at a cove along the Langstrand we may be able to rescue Thorongil before he is brought back to the Kindred of the Coins.

'What say you, [placeholder]? Are you prepared for a chase?'
'I will slay every Corsair that thinks to keep my son from me!'
